branchCategory.name: Valves (All Types)

branchItem.name: LVA, High Purity Chemical Valve, Air Operated, Threaded Ports, Single Type
LVA*A, High Purity Chemical Valve, Air Operated, Integral Fitting, Stacking Type
LVA200, 3 Port High Purity Chemical Valve, Air Operated, Threaded Type
LVA*-AD/ND, High Purity Chemical Valve, Air Operated, Organic Solvent Compatible
branchItem.description: <p>High purity, air operated series LVA valve is made from material that are compatible with organic solvents.&nbsp; It is available in 3 fitting types: double ferrule, integrated tubing and metal gasket seal.&nbsp; It is also available in 5 body class sizes and inch or metric applicable tubing sizes.</p>
